Job Description:
Junior Software developer 

(experience 0 to 1 year)

Person will be work on MVC .NET web based product and projects. He will be responsible for Designing ,  Coding & Testing web based application. Understand requirements and provide best solution to fulfil requirements. Ready to accept challenges and give their best to complete challenge. 

Candidate must have knowledge of HTML ,  CSS ,  jQuery ,  MVC ,  C# ,  WCF ,  XML and SQL server. Candidate must have good knowledge in SQL writing queries ,  procedures and functions. 

Candidate should have Bachelor or master degree in CS ,  IT and CE. 

Only 

0 to 1 year of experience in .NET web development can eligible for this post. MVC and SQL skills are added advantages. Salary will be given as per industry standard based on qualification ,  experience and skills.
